project.component: { "keyToString": { "DefaultGoTemplateProperty": "Go File", "Go Build.go build fakedb.go.executor": "Run", "Go Test.BenchmarkRowsToJson in sql2json.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestRowsToJson in sql2json.executor": "Profiler#2", "Go Test.TestRowsToJson/Nil_Rows in sql2json.executor": "Debug", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.go.formatter.settings.were.checked": "true", "RunOnceActivity.go.migrated.go.modules.settings": "true", "RunOnceActivity.go.modules.go.list.on.any.changes.was.set": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "go.import.settings.migrated": "true", "go.sdk.automatically.set": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "/home/oleh", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm" }, "keyToStringList": { "DatabaseDriversLRU": [ "mariadb" ] } }

MESSAGE.value:
Add unit tests for RowsToJson function
Implemented a new test case in sql2json_test.go to validate the RowsToJson function using sqlmock. Adjusted RowsToJson function in sql2json.go to handle nil rows check properly before initializing the result slice.

Delete obsolete database configuration files
Removed outdated database configuration files for MARIADB from the project. This cleanup helps prevent confusion and potential misconfiguration in future updates.

Add new MariaDB data source configurations
Introduced new database configuration files for MariaDB to the project. This includes the data source, SQL dialect mappings, and local storage settings, optimizing connectivity and compatibility for development.

Add MariaDB data source configuration
This commit introduces a new XML file configuring a MariaDB data source in the .idea directory. The file includes grants for various database permissions and collations for multiple character sets. This setup will facilitate database management and operations within the development environment.

Add MariaDB data source configuration
Introduced a new XML file for configuring a MariaDB data source in the .idea directory. This file includes grants for various database permissions and collations for multiple character sets, facilitating better database management in the development environment.
Refactor tests by moving DB setup outside t.Run loop.

Refactor tests by moving DB setup outside t.Run loop.
This change adjusts the test setup in sql2json_test.go to move database setup code outside the t.Run loop. This refactoring aims to streamline the tests and avoid repetitive setup, enhancing test performance and readability. Additionally, updated the workspace.xml to reflect these changes.

Add IntelliJ IDEA configuration files for MariaDB integration
This commit introduces new IntelliJ IDEA configuration files including `dataSources.local.xml` and modifications to `workspace.xml`. These changes configure the project for MariaDB and enhance the development environment settings, ensuring proper database and VCS integration.

Add corrupted data source files for diagnostic purposes
Added two files, .reason.txt and .xml, related to a corrupted data source in the .idea folder. These files include error logs and database model information that will assist in identifying and resolving persistence issues with the database storage backend.

Add corrupted data source files for diagnostics
Included .reason.txt and .xml files to log issues with a corrupted data source in the .idea folder. These additions provide essential error logs and database model information to aid in debugging persistence problems within the database storage backend.
